com.example.individual.repository

Interface OfferRepository


  • public interface OfferRepository
    Repository interface for managing Offer entities.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<com.example.individual.model.Offer> findByCategory(java.lang.String category)
      Retrieves a list of offers by category.
      java.util.List<com.example.individual.model.Offer> findByTutorUsername(java.lang.String tutorUsername)
      Retrieves a list of offers by tutor username.
      java.util.List<com.example.individual.model.Offer> findOffersByKeyword(java.lang.String keyword)
      Retrieves a list of offers containing a keyword in their title or description, case-insensitive.

    • Method Detail

      • findOffersByKeyword

        java.util.List<com.example.individual.model.Offer> findOffersByKeyword(java.lang.String keyword)
        Retrieves a list of offers containing a keyword in their title or description, case-insensitive.
        Parameters:
        keyword - The keyword to search for in offers' titles or descriptions.
        Returns:
        A list of offers matching the keyword search.

      • findByCategory

        java.util.List<com.example.individual.model.Offer> findByCategory(java.lang.String category)
        Retrieves a list of offers by category.
        Parameters:
        category - The category of offers to retrieve.
        Returns:
        A list of offers belonging to the specified category.

      • findByTutorUsername

        java.util.List<com.example.individual.model.Offer> findByTutorUsername(java.lang.String tutorUsername)
        Retrieves a list of offers by tutor username.
        Parameters:
        tutorUsername - The username of the tutor.
        Returns:
        A list of offers posted by the specified tutor.
